name: Space Rocket (itch)
description:
Help us to get a Google Play Developer Account!
With your donation you help us to upload this and more great games on the popular Google Play Store, making it available to everyone.

Space Rocket is a new and exciting arcade game, where you have to overcome not only your enemies, also to yourself. Race against the clock under a dynamic and endless world, shooting against all enemy ships that block your way. Earn points and win special weapons to accomplish your mission. But not everything will be nice, How much will stay alive before the clock turns against you? it's time to find out.


• Go through a dynamic and endless world with ambiance and difficulty variations with each new level reached.
• 6 different enemies types, each one includes its own 'Bomb', which will bring a little more troubles.
• Unlock 8 different weapon types, with every level reached, changing its color and behavior.
• Unlock new powers that will help you accomplish your mission.
